00001 #ifndef _APPROXSIMTIME_H
00002 #define _APPROXSIMTIME_H
00003 
00004 
00005 // System
00006 #include <iomanip>
00007 #include <iostream>
00008 #include <limits>
00009 
00010 // Own
00011 #include "stdint.h"
00012 
00013 #ifdef __win__
00014 #define APPROXSIM_INVALID_TIME (LLONG_MIN)
00015 #define APPROXSIM_MIN_TIME (LLONG_MIN + 1)
00016 #define APPROXSIM_MAX_TIME (LLONG_MAX)
00017 #else
00018 #define APPROXSIM_INVALID_TIME (std::numeric_limits<int64_t>::min())
00019 #define APPROXSIM_MIN_TIME (std::numeric_limits<int64_t>::min() + 1)
00020 #define APPROXSIM_MAX_TIME (std::numeric_limits<int64_t>::max())
00021 #endif
00022 
00034 class Time {
00035 private:
00036      int64_t mMilliSec;   
00037 
00038 public:
00039      Time() : mMilliSec(APPROXSIM_INVALID_TIME) {} 
00040      Time(const Time &t) : mMilliSec(t.mMilliSec) {}       
00041 
00050      Time(int64_t d, int64_t h = 0, int64_t m = 0, int64_t s = 0, int64_t ms = 0)
00051           : mMilliSec((d * 86400 + h * 3600 + m * 60 + s) * 1000 + ms) {}
00052 
00053      
00059      static Time maxTime() { return Time(0, 0, 0, 0, APPROXSIM_MAX_TIME); }
00060 
00066      static Time minTime() { return Time(0, 0, 0, 0, APPROXSIM_MIN_TIME); }
00067 
00073      int64_t days() const { return mMilliSec / 86400000; }
00074 
00080      double hoursd() const { return static_cast<double>(mMilliSec) / 3600000.0; }
00081 
00088      int64_t milliSeconds() const { return mMilliSec; }
00089 
00095      void addDays(int ndays) { mMilliSec += 86400000 * ndays; }
00096 
00102      void addHours(int nhours) { mMilliSec += 3600000 * nhours; }
00103 
00109      bool isValid() const { return mMilliSec != APPROXSIM_INVALID_TIME; }
00110 
00111      // Operators
00113      bool operator  < (const Time &t) const { return (mMilliSec < t.mMilliSec); }
00115      bool operator  > (const Time &t) const { return (mMilliSec > t.mMilliSec); }
00117      bool operator <= (const Time &t) const { return (mMilliSec <= t.mMilliSec); }
00119      bool operator >= (const Time &t) const { return (mMilliSec >= t.mMilliSec); }
00121      bool operator == (const Time &t) const { return (mMilliSec == t.mMilliSec); }
00123      bool operator != (const Time &t) const { return (mMilliSec != t.mMilliSec); }
00125      Time &operator += (const Time &t) { mMilliSec += t.mMilliSec; return *this; }
00127      Time operator + (const Time &t) { return Time(0, 0, 0, 0, mMilliSec + t.mMilliSec); }
00129      Time &operator -= (const Time &t) { mMilliSec -= t.mMilliSec; return *this; }
00131      Time operator - (const Time &t) { return Time(0, 0, 0, 0, mMilliSec - t.mMilliSec); }
00132 
00133      // Friends
00135      friend std::ostream &operator << (std::ostream &o, const Time &t) {
00136           int64_t d  = t.mMilliSec / 86400000;
00137           int64_t h  = (t.mMilliSec - d * 86400000) / 3600000;
00138           int64_t m  = (t.mMilliSec - d * 86400000 - h * 3600000) / 60000;
00139           int64_t s  = (t.mMilliSec - d * 86400000 - h * 3600000 - m * 60000) / 1000;
00140           int64_t ms = t.mMilliSec - d * 86400000 - h * 3600000 - m * 60000 - s * 1000;
00141           char prev = o.fill('0');
00142           o << "Day: " << d << " "
00143             << std::setw(2) << h << ":"
00144             << std::setw(2) << m << ":"
00145             << std::setw(2) << s << ":"
00146             << std::setw(3) << ms;
00147           o.fill(prev);
00148           return o;
00149      }
00150 };
